data.title: Rapt
data.meta_description: Nominated for four Cesar Awards (including Best Film, Best Director and Best Actor), Lucas Belvaux’s edge-of-your-seat thriller — inspired by the 1978 kidnapping of French industrialist Edouard-Jean Empain — features a career-defining performance by Yvan Attalas a millionaire playboy who is abducted and held for ransom for 60 days. (Lorber Films)
data.text:

Jason Dietz
